aka: Shigi-Jigi, or Everything will be fine

director.name: 基里尔·谢列布连尼科夫 Kirill Serebrennikov

trans_title: Shigi-Jigi, or Everything will be fine
introduction: The underground icon of the Southern Russian city of Rostov-on-Don in the early, rare and little-known (but the best imho) film for local television from Kirill Serebrennikov, in the memoirs of friends, alcoholics and homeless representatives of the local art bohemia. Restored in 2018 with a broken and accidentally preserved VHS cassette.With the participation of: Sergey, Dima, Kolya, Vika, Madame Elfrida, the female trio "Kasatki", Vitalik, Gena, the future famous theatrical and film director Kirill, the underground artists, unrecognized poets and musicians, alcoholics, homeless, young aligarchs, loafers and little Maldoror.
